thread.title: ST. BERNARD SCHOOL
thread.title_full: Hodges Badge Company, Inc reviewed by ST. BERNARD SCHOOL

author: ST. BERNARD SCHOOL
title: ST. BERNARD SCHOOL
text: Hodges Badge is the best company ever. When calling you actually get to speak with a person and they take their time with you. Service if efficeient and fast. The staff is always very friendly. The quality and workmanship is outstanding and prices are reasonable. I wouldn't think of using anyone else for awards!
